text: Pecados y Milagros () is the seventh album by Mexican Latin singer Lila Downs.Lila Downs-Pecados y Milagros Allmusic. It was released in 2011. It reached the top of the charts in Mexico, Germany, Argentina, Colombia, Spain and the United States. It also reached the top ten in other major markets. Downs did a tour for the album called the "Pecados y Milagros World Tour". The singles on Pecados y Milagros are: "Palomo del Comalito", "Zapata se Queda" and "Mezcalito". In 2012 the album Pecados y Milagros won a Grammy Award for "Best Regional Mexican Music Album (Including Tejano)". The same year it won a Latin Grammy Award for "Best Folk Album". The main music genres which make up the album are pop, folk and ska. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2011 albums Category:Lila Downs albums Category:Grammy Award-winning albums
title: Pecados y Milagros
